'''Battle of Sudden Flame''' is the twelfth track of the [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-themed album [[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]] by [[Blind Guardian]]. The song tells of the [[Dagor Bragollach]], in which [[Morgoth]] breaks the [[Siege of Angband]] using his [[Balrogs]] and [[Dragons]].<ref>{{S|18}}</ref>

==Lyrics==
<poem style="font-style:italic; margin-left:20px;">
Oh Lord, here I stand
Suddenly everything's gone
For all Noldor
From now on my life
Is my gift to you
Just lead my fate
To the victory of elves
</poem>
